day name: Transfer of the Precious Relics of our Father among the Saints John Chrysostom
name: our Father among the Saints John Chrysostom
troparia: (Tone 8) The divine Church rejoices* and the whole world keeps feast with radiance* at the transfer of your relics, O venerable hierarch John Chrysostom.* Your life as a bishop was godly* and you willingly became a martyr.* Therefore we cry to you, O martyr, passion-bearer and hierarchsâ€™ companion:* Pray to Christ God that our souls may be saved.
kontakia: (Tone 1) The precious Church rejoices mystically* at the transfer of your holy relics* and treasuring them as costly gold* it lavishly grants to those who hymn you the grace of healing,* by your prayers, O John the Golden-mouthed.
